title: The Passion of a discontented minde
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed by V.S. for Iohn Baily, and are to be sold at his shop at the doore of the office of the vi clarks in Chancerie lane,
notes: Variously attributed to Nicholas Breton, Robert Devereux and Robert Southwell--Cf. STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
